experience review decided try candlewood suites instead figured couldnt worse arrived hotel greeted nice aroma fresh manure spread plants surrounding hotel little actually inside manure smell welcome candlewood basic thats budget hotels mainly booked kitchen hotels cooktop sized fridge dishwasher pretty couple nights directly hall checked dogs severe separation anxiety owners left 7am thats Reviews.Content: wife stayed nights clerk check nice pleasant hotel clean store wide variety food necessities reasonable prices exercise nice equipment excellent condition clean comfortable kitchen clean repair bed clean comfortable internet easy connect adequate speed heat air bathroom clean hair dryer bowed shower curtain water soft flat screen tv dvd player movies available free front desk negatives bed little close wall difficult night drawer stains bottom rest spotless definitely stay
